tool_name: All Cars Names, Image and Variants Info
tool_description: Search All Cars Names, Image and Variants Info with this api ,search once and get list of all cars. use it for auto-suggestion
title: All Cars Names, Image and Variants Info

api_list.name: Search All Cars
api_list.description:
This API will fetch you all cars list, 
If you need bike details change **vehicle_type** from "car" to "bike".

utterances.utterance: Can you show me a list of all cars?
I need information about all available bikes.
Please fetch me the details of all cars.
Could you provide a list of all bikes?
I want to see all the cars available.
Show me all the bikes in the database.
Can you list all the cars with their images and variants?
I need a list of all bikes along with their details.
Please provide me with a list of all cars.
Could you fetch me all the bikes available?
